problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,AO的延长线交过点B的⊙O的切线于点C,如果∠C=50°,则∠A的度数是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the chord of ⊙O, and the extended line of AO crosses the tangent of ⊙O at point B to point C. If ∠C = N_0, then the degree of ∠A is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接OB,∵CB的⊙O的切线,∴∠OBC=90°,∴∠BOC=90°-∠C=40°,由圆周角定理得,∠A=\frac{1}{2}∠BOC=20°,故选:A．
raw_comment: 本题考查的是切线的性质、圆周角定理,掌握圆的切线垂直于经过切点的半径是解题的关键．
